column1: 20701745_25,s0,T1,T2,A striking feature of ,KPNA7," is its localization to the nucleus under steady state conditions, while ",KPNA2, is predominantly cytoplasmic.,Not_a_complex
20701745_25,s1,T3,T4,This nuclear localization suggests that nucleocytoplasmic shuttling of ,KPNA7, differs from that of the other members of the ,importin alpha, family.,Not_a_complex

20701745_25,s2,T5,T10,There are three possibilities for the altered subcellular distribution; 1) enhanced nuclear import by ,importin beta,; 2) decreased nuclear export by ,CAS,"; and 3) inefficient release of KPNA7 from target NLS, resulting in nuclear retention.",Not_a_complex

20701745_25,s3,T7,T8,"The most likely of these situations, given our evidence that ",KPNA7, binds ,importin beta," with much higher affinity than other a family members is that this enhanced binding results in increased nuclear import of KPNA7.
